gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Magic 101, Hornets 89
gameRecap.excerpt: The Magic defeated the Hornets, 101-89, as they won their fourth game in a row to improve to 36-26. Paolo Banchero led the Magic with 22 points, five rebounds, and three assists as Wendell Carter Jr. added 12 points and nine rebounds. Vasilije Micic led Charlotte with a career-high 21 points, along with five rebounds and four assists as Brandon Miller added 18 points, five rebounds, and three assists. Charlotte moves to 15-47 with the loss.
